definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Syria's Interior Minister Bassam Abd al-Megid is calling the bombing an "act of terrorism."
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚内政部长马吉德说这个事件是“恐怖行动”。

sentences.english: Their candidate to succeed Mr Bossi is the interior minister, Roberto Maroni.
sentences.chinese: 他们接替波西的候选人是内政部长马洛尼诺。

sentences.english: Eight people were arrested with weapons overnight, the interior minister said.
sentences.chinese: 内政部长说，已经连夜逮捕了8名武装分子。

sentences.english: The first political casualty at the federal level was the unpopular home minister.
sentences.chinese: 联邦层级的第一个政治牺牲品是不得人心的内政部长。

sentences.english: Anna Maria Cancellieri, a former prefect, becomes interior minister.
sentences.chinese: 其中前任地方行政长官安娜玛利亚提拔为内政部长。

sentences.english: The interior minister has been negotiating with a group of armed prisoners in an effort to persuade them to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 内政部长正在与武装囚犯谈判，试图说服他们投降。

definition: Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
chair (or president, speaker etc) of national congress
Ursula von der Leyen (1958-), German politician, president of the European Commission from 2019
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
member of the US House of Representatives
